text: Pierre Picault (27 February 1899 â€“ 20 November 2008) was, at age 109, France's last surviving French veteran of World War I and eldest man. He became the last French World War I veteran following the death of 108-year-old Fernand Goux on 9 November 2008. Category:1899 births Category:2008 deaths Category:French centenarians
title: Pierre Picault
